articles.author: Alexander Smith, Caroline Radnofsky, Matthew Mulligan, Reuters, The Associated Press, Sara Mhaidli, Patrick Smith
articles.title: U.S. distances itself from Belgorod incursion into Russia by pro-Ukraine fighters - NBC News
articles.description: The United States has sought to distance itself from a dramatic raid into Russian territory by pro-Ukraine fighters who appeared to use American equipment in their attack.
articles.content:
The United States has sought to distance itself from a dramatic raid into Russian territory by pro-Ukraine fighters who appeared to use American equipment in their attack.
